FuncDef:
The hello-option join-attribute enable command enables PIM interfaces to send PIM Hello messages that carry the Join attribute.
The undo hello-option join-attribute enable command restores the default configuration.
By default, PIM interfaces are disabled from sending PIM Hello messages that carry the Join attribute.
ParentView: PIM view of a public network instance
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If dual feed and selective receiving is needed to improve fault convergence performance in multicast service scenarios, multicast source cloning-based PIM FRR can be deployed to protect services. Multicast source cloning-based PIM FRR requires PIM Join messages to carry vector information, and PIM Join messages can carry vector information only if interfaces are enabled to send PIM Hello messages that carry the Join attribute. In this case, you can run the hello-option join-attribute enable command to enable all PIM interfaces to send PIM Hello messages that carry the Join attribute.
